thread.section_title: Booking.com Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Booking.com | www.booking.com
thread.title: Mrs D Everitt
thread.title_full: Booking.com Beoordeeld door Mrs D Everitt

author: Mrs D Everitt
title: Mrs D Everitt
text: Absolute disgrace booked with them paid on my card for the hotel to ring one hour later telling me it was overbooked ring bookings.com for refund. Rang them was told they would find somewhere else rang me to say they had found somewhere and they would pay the difference my husband drove 15 miles after work to be told no booking. Rang them at 7 at night to be told I would have to wait 7 to ten days for a refund now sleeping in car .
